definition: The boundless vista is at the perilous peak (proverb)/fig. exhilaration follows a hard-won victory
pinyin: wu2 xian4 feng1 guang1 zai4 xian3 feng1

sentences.english: We continued our select coastal journey in Fujian, which boasts scenic beauty and a brilliant cultural tradition.
sentences.chinese: 我们在风光秀美，文化灿烂的福建继续海疆精华之旅。

sentences.english: A windy march and a rainy April makes a beautiful May.
sentences.chinese: 三月刮和风，雨下四月里，五月风光多美丽。

sentences.english: This old house has seen better days.
sentences.chinese: 这些老房子曾有过风光的日子。

sentences.english: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.
sentences.chinese: 表现了牛在溪边饮水的迷人的田园风光。

sentences.english: A road trip into the country can be a leisurely drive that lets you enjoy the scenic view.
sentences.chinese: 去郊外的自驾游就从容到能让你饱览沿途风光了。

sentences.english: If do not appreciate the local scenery and inner world.
sentences.chinese: 如果不欣赏本地风光和内心世界。

sentences.english: That dream wizard waved his hands, I saw the scenery of the Antarctic and Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 那个梦精灵双手一挥，我看到了南极和北极的风光。

sentences.english: You can zoom in now and get a pretty nice view of the Dome.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以随意放大来好好观赏一下佐治亚穹顶的风光。

sentences.english: Changning shows pastoral scenery and human landscape.
sentences.chinese: 展示了昌宁的山水田园风光及人文风貌。

sentences.english: This was the happy side of the house .
sentences.chinese: 这是住宅风光明媚的一面。

sentences.english: A unique scenery here, hidden but beautiful spot.
sentences.chinese: 一则此处风光独特，别有洞天。

sentences.english: The island canyon scenery looks endlessly, the echo ripples between the white clouds.
sentences.chinese: 岛峡风光看不尽啦，回声荡漾白云间喽。

sentences.english: The two wonderful places, infinitely good scenery. " The song gave a vivid portrayal of Shantang Street."
sentences.chinese: 两处好地方，无限好风光”便是对山塘的生动写照。

sentences.english: Beautiful, 'Hill Yimeng minor, ' the Linyi unlimited calling out the beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 优美的《沂蒙山小调》唱出了临沂无限秀美的风光。

sentences.english: The foot of Batu Batu lake also known for its beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 巴都山下的巴都湖也以风光漂亮著称。

sentences.english: The scenery here has great charm, reminding one of the land of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 这里山清水秀，宛然桂林风光。

definition: nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
